items.title: Coforge share price falls 2.04% in Tuesday's session
items.description: With today's fall, COFORGE LIMITED is currently trading at Rs 1,710.90.

items.title: Triveni Turbine shares slip 9% on weak Q1; order delays, export weakness drag performance
items.description: Triveni Turbine share price: The management attributed the weak quarter to geopolitical uncertainties, which disrupted operations by delaying inspections and pushing order dispatches into later quarters.

items.title: Infosys share price declines 1.22% in intraday trade
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 1,462.40, Infosys has seen some volatility in today's session.

items.title: ITC shares fall marginally in today's session; over 25.9 lakh shares traded
items.description: Shares of ITC were trading at Rs 414.90 on the NSE at 12:20 pm, a decline of 0.47% from the previous close.

items.title: Hindustan Unilever shares fall 0.54% in today's session; over 3.5 lakh shares traded
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 2,530.00, Hindustan Unilever reflects a minor decrease in today's session with over 3.5 lakh shares traded.

items.title: New India Assur, Tata Inv Corp among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With New India Assur trading at Rs 204.33 and Tata Inv Corp at Rs 7,286, both stocks reflect significant gains within the Nifty Midcap 150 index.

items.title: UNO Minda shares surge 3.76% amid high volume in today's session
items.description: As of today, August 5, 2025, UNO Minda stock is trading with significant positive momentum following a recent Moneycontrol analysis that indicates a bearish sentiment.

items.title: Bharti Airtel shares among top gainers on Nifty 50, rise 0.98%
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 1,933.30, Bharti Airtel has shown positive movement and is among the top gainers on the Nifty 50 index during today's trading session.

items.title: Q1 Results impact: Godfrey Phillips shares rally 10% to hit all-time high, Oswal Pumps rises 2%, Crizac down 3%
items.description: Godfrey Phillips announced 2-for-1 bonus share issue for its shareholders, and fixed September 16 as the record date.

items.title: Sensex down 300 pts, Nifty below 24,650 amid Trump's tariff threat; FMCG, IT stocks lead decline
items.description: Laggards on the Nifty index included Infosys, Asian Paints, Adani Ports, Reliance Industries, and Bharat Electronics.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro shares trade flat in Tuesday's session
items.description: With the shares trading flat, investors are closely monitoring Larsen & Toubro's performance amid recent corporate developments and financial results.
